topics.body:
Hey I just thought of something.


Chances are not only will Touhou become extremely popular because it's officially coming to the west, but so will One Punch, if/when Boku no Hero academia gets a anime, Daily Life with monster girl and so forth will become the new most popular weab things.

What I mean by this is pretty easy; if you're in the top ten most popular weab things then you're almost assured to become super popular when you either come to the west and/or get a anime or such.

An example of this is Kantai; even though the anime was mediocre I'll totally admit that it helped explode the popularity of the franchise a metric fuck ton.
